name: Apropos
description: Display a list of commands whose names match {topics}

name: Apropos in-depth
description: Display all commands and variables whose documentation matches {topic}

name: Display Bindings
description: Displays a list of all currently active keybindings in the order minor, major, then global.

name: show all sessions
description: Shows all active sessions. Useful for checking if there are detatched sessions hanging around.

name: move window
description: move window L / D / U / R

name: save macro
description: saves {macro} as a series of keystrokes to {register}

name: show registers
description: Shows a list of the evil-mode-registers

name: reverse undo
note: may have to C-g again to get normal undoing behavior

name: search-under-cursor
description: Search forward for whatever is under the cursor.  As with regular search, ? goes backward and n goes forward through instances of the word.

name: find all refs
description: Find all references for an identifier at point

name: find file at point
description: finds file under cursor, when in move mode

name: pop-marker-stack
description: jump back to the last place you C-c . -ed. Can jump backwards as many times as you've called xref-find-definitions
